aboutme.name: Self Introduction
aboutme.description: Hello, My name is Chanyu Choung. I have a Korean background and I'm a senior student at Lehman College, CUNY.

aboutme.name: My Majors
aboutme.description: I double major in Computer Science and CGI. I'm expected to graduate at Spring 2023. I love video games and both of my majors help with me creating my very own video game.

aboutme.name: My Interests
aboutme.description: My interests are watching K-Drama or Youtube, listening to the pop musics and playing video games. I don't SNS, but I socialize with people who have similar interests to me.

aboutme.name: My Resume
aboutme.description: My Resume can be seen at 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cchanyu/ cchanyu.github.io/master/src/contents/Resume.jpg'. Github Username: Cchanyu

aboutme.name: My Dream
aboutme.description: My dream is to become a full-time software engineer at New York and live a normal quiet life.

aboutme.name: My Strength
aboutme.description: When I like something, I repeat it over 7-times to really understand it and I enjoy the process of it. That's how you'd know if I like something.
